text: wentworth cheswill day the governor shall proclaim april as wentworth cheswill day in new hampshire to celebrate the th anniversary of his birth and shall encourage all new hampshire citizens to observe the day with appropriate educational activities mr cheswill was born on april in newmarket new hampshire mr cheswill a man of color has been said to have been the first elected official in the united states he was a revolutionary war veteran and served under john langdon in langdon s company of light horse volunteers he was an elected newmarket town official and served the town in various elected town offices from until his death in in mr cheswill was among the founders of the first free library in the town and provided in his will for public access to his personal library
